title: Darkroom 6 brings four new powerful masking features and a price bump (30% off)
content:
Powerful photo and video editor for iOS and macOS Darkroom just announced a new update. With version 6.0, the app is bringing four mask types so users can take advantage of different layers when editing an image. Here’s everything you need to know about it.

more…

The post Darkroom 6 brings four new powerful masking features and a price bump (30% off) appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Powerful photo and video editor Darkroom just announced a new update. With version 6.0, the app is bringing four mask types.
